#Text=Become an Avon Sales Consultant
#Text=If you have a passion for cosmetics and sales , then becoming an Avon representative might be for you .
#Text=To become a representative or obtain more information about becoming one , first complete an application online .
#Text=Through this application , a rep in your area will get in touch with you to set up a meeting .
#Text=Use this meeting to ask your rep questions that you have about setting up a business with Avon .
#Text=Once you have been appointed , you will have access to brochures , samples , and sales and training tools .
#Text=Then , begin selling Avon products by setting up your online store , handing out brochures , and by hosting an Avon “ get together . ”
#Text=Steps
#Text=Signing Up
#Text=Complete the application .
#Text=In order to find out more information about becoming a representative for Avon you will need to fill out the application .
#Text=Fill out the application on Avon 's website .
#Text=Avon has branches in different countries , so make sure you are on the website for your specific country when filling out the application .
#Text=You will not be charged an application fee until you place your first order .
#Text=In other words , it is free to sign-up .
#Text=The application fee is $ 15 in the U.S. and 16 Euros in the U.K.
#Text=You will need to fill out your name , address , contact information , and your preferred type of communication .
#Text=If you do not have Internet access , contact Avon ’s customer service at 1-800-367-2866.
#Text=Meet with an area manager .
#Text=Once you have filled out the application , a local area manager will contact you .
#Text=Arrange a meeting with your area manager .
#Text=Your manager will explain how Avon works , as well as the materials you will receive and need to purchase to get started .
#Text=Your manager will explain that you can receive up to 50 percent on the products you sell .
#Text=Ask questions .
#Text=Ask about earning potential , work hours , and the most effective methods and tools for selling products , i.e. , the online website , apps , " get togethers , " and brochures .
#Text=You may also want to ask about turnover rates , and how to cancel your application if you decide Avon is n’t for you .
#Text=If you are interested in becoming a sales leader , use this time to express your interest .
#Text=As a sales leader you will have a team of members that you appoint and mentor .
#Text=Register online .
#Text=After you are appointed to be a representative , you will need to register on the Representative website online .
#Text=This is where you will be able to place your fist order .
#Text=Once you are registered you will also receive brochures for your first two campaigns ( 20 ) , samples , and sales tools .
#Text=The sales tools include an appointment pack , a calling book , customer order slips , and your own online store .
#Text=You will have access to training tools such as guides and tutorials , as well .
#Text=You will not be charged the application fee until you complete your first order .
#Text=Finding Support
#Text=Go to a local meeting .
#Text=For every campaign , meetings are held locally .
#Text=At these meetings you will be able to meet novice and experienced representatives .
#Text=Top sellers and sales leaders also speak at these meetings .
#Text=These meetings are a great way to find local support .
#Text=Ask experienced representatives about the methods and tools that produce the most sales , as well as other tactics they use to promote and find more business .
#Text=For example , " How has the website and the mobile app affected your sales ?

#Text=For example , ask experienced representatives ,  How have you managed to keep your customers ? "

column1: #Text=or " What tactics do you use to keep customers interested , as well as find new customers ? "
#Text=You can also find online training in the “ My Learning Zone ” in your portal .
#Text=It is filled with personalized training modules that will help you develop your skills at every phase in the process of becoming a representative .
#Text=Download the guide .
#Text=Avon has developed a free guide for representatives , as well as for those who are still considering becoming a representative .
#Text=Top experts in the industry made the guide .
#Text=The guide discusses self awareness , self confidence , and self management ; tools that are crucial to becoming a successful sales representative .
#Text=Find a copy of the guide here : https://www.avon.uk.com/help-support .
#Text=Selling Avon Products
#Text=Set-up your online store .
#Text=Representatives are given their own online store called “ My Avon Store . ”
#Text=You can set up your online store in a few easy steps by following the instructions online .
#Text=Online stores are great because they allow your customers to shop from you online .
#Text=Create business cards that contain your information , including your website , when you are marketing your business .
#Text=You can also choose to opt in to Avon 's mobile phone app , Avon Brochure .
#Text=This app connects you to new customers who are looking for a representative in your area .
#Text=Hand out brochures .
#Text=Every three weeks Avon produces a new brochure .
#Text=The brochures are filled with deals , promotions , and new products .
#Text=Therefore , they are a great way to market your business .
#Text=Carry brochures with you at all times so you can hand them out to your friends , family members , and customers ( old and new ) .
#Text=Host an Avon get together
#Text=Another great way to market your business is to host an Avon " get together " at your house .
#Text=You will be given brochures , samples , and information on new products to pass out to your guests .
#Text=Invite friends , family members , and existing customers .
#Text=To create new customers and contacts , ask your guests to bring along one new person to the event .
